document_name: Criteria and methods to encourage the production of electricity by photovoltaic conversion of the sun source, in implementation of article 7 of Legislative Decree 29 December 2003, n. 387.
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ITA/2007/ITA-2007-01-01-Criteria and methods to encourage the production of electricity by photovoltaic conversion of the sun source, in implementation of article 7 of Legislative Decree 29 December 2003, n. 387._57cb896ee415e71c09dda258343ed68d.pdf
document_description:
The decree introduced a new version of the feed-in premium scheme applied to photovoltaic plants connected to the grid by individuals, registered companies, condominiums and public bodies, with a nominal capacity higher than 1 kWp (output power achieved by a Solar module under full solar radiation).

The decree provided a set of tariffs, valid for a period of 20 years, with a bonus in cases of a high degree of photovoltaic integration in the buildings.

A new decree was released in 2011 with the same purpose.
